Overwhelm.Description: Stun a target enemy unit for 2 seconds. Goes through Magic Immunity.

Bash.Description: Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.

Abyssal Blade.Extra Info: Cannot be purchased by Slardar, Faceless Void, Troll Warlord, Spirit Breaker. Does not stack with other bash.

Aghanim's Scepter.Description: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

Ultimate Upgrade.Description: Upgrades the ultimates of certain heroes.

Summon Animal Courier.Description: Summons an Animal Courier to carry items for you. The Animal Courier is not affected by most spells, and has magic immunity. It gives 150 gold to each enemy player if killed. The courier is invulnerable when near the friendly Fountain. It can use some items that cost no mana, being able to use Healing Salve and Clarity on heroes (but not on itself), Tangoes and the Smoke of Deceit which will provide the shroud effect to any allied heroes in close proximity to the Courier.

Replenish Mana.Description: Restores mana in an area around the hero.

Arcane Boots.Extra Info: Does not work on Meepo clones.

Unholy Strength.Description: Gives +31 damage, +10 attack speed, and +25 strength while active, but drains 40 HP per second. You cannot die from the health loss when the bonus strength is gone, or the health drain per second. The STR gain happens over 0.7 seconds.

Assault Aura.Description: Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units, and decreases armor for nearby enemies. Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.

Cleave.Description: Deals a percent of attack damage in a 250 radius around the target. Does not work on ranged heroes. Cleave damage on non-primary targets is not reduced by armor values.

Avatar.Description: Grants magic immunity. Duration and cooldown decrease with each use. Some Ultimate Abilities are able to disable through Black King Bar.

Damage Return.Description: Returns any damage you take to the unit that dealt the damage.

Blade Mail.Extra Info: Deals pure damage. Does not reflect damage from other blademails. The returned damage is based on the damage you received after armor or magic reduction.

Blink.Description: Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away. If damage is taken from an enemy hero, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.

Bloodpact.Description: Starts with 8 charges. Gains 1 charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge bestows 1 mana regeneration per second, reduces gold lost from death by 25, and reduces respawn time by 4 seconds. When the bearer dies, restores 400 HP + 30 HP per charge to allied units within 1675 range, then loses a third of its charges. While dead, the bearer continues to receive experience at the death location and gives 1800 unit vision there.

Bloodstone.Extra Info: Amount of charges lost is rounded up. Range of experience gained while dead is 1000.

Teleport.Description: Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure. While channeling, gives 200 range vision on the target and pings your allies' minimaps. Teleporting to a non-fountain building takes additional time if any allies have also teleported within a 1100 radius of your target within 25 seconds.

Boots of Travel.Extra Info: Will automatically target your Fountain if double clicked. Shares cooldown with Town Portal Scroll.

Regenerate.Description: Restores HP and Mana over time. Effect is lost if unit is attacked. Empty Bottle refills near town fountain. You can also store runes in the bottle, to save for later use. After 2 minutes, stored Runes will be activated.

Armor Bonus.Description: Gives +2 armor to all nearby allied units. Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.

Regenerate Mana.Description: Restores Mana over time. If the user is attacked, the effect is lost.

Critical Strike.Description: Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.
Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.

Energy Burst.Description: Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.

Corruption.Description: Your attacks reduce target's armor. Desolator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Purge.Description: Purges a target unit, removing buffs, slowing, and dealing damage if it is a summoned unit.

Feedback.Description: Your attacks burn 20 mana (36 mana when upgraded) and deal the same amount in damage. Upgradable. Diffusal Blade is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Endurance.Description: Gives bonus +10 attack speed and +10% movement speed to surrounding allies.

Swiftness Aura.Description: Gives bonus attack and movement speed to surrounding allies.

Reveal.Description: Reveals invisible Heroes in a nearby area and slows them.

Ether Blast.Description: Converts you and your target into ethereal form. Target unit is slowed and cannot attack or be attacked, and takes 2× your primary attribute +75 as damage.

Cyclone.Description: Target unit is swept up in a cyclone for 2.5 seconds, and is invulnerable.

Cold Attack.Description: Attacks slow the movement and attack speed of the target. Eye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers. Eye of Skadi can be combined with a lifesteal Unique Attack Modifier.

Summon Flying Courier.Description: Summons a Flying Courier to carry items for you. The Flying Courier is not affected by most spells, and has magic immunity. It gives 175 gold to each enemy player if killed. The Flying Courier is invulnerable when near the friendly Fountain and will instantly die if it is too close to the enemy fountain area. It can use some items that cost no mana, being able to use Healing Salve and Clarity on heroes (but not on itself), Tangoes and the Smoke of Deceit which will provide the shroud effect to any allied heroes in close proximity to the Flying Courier.

Force.Description: Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing. Double click to self-cast.

True Sight.Description: Gives the ability to see invisible units and wards. Drops on death.

Ghost Form.Description: Enter ghost form, unable to attack or be attacked, but take 40% extra damage from spells. Using a Teleport Scroll dispels Ghost Form. Boots of Travel do not dispel Ghost Form.

Transmute.Description: Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5× experience. Cannot be used on Ancients.
Transmute.Extra Info: Does not work on Necronomicon units

Regeneration Aura.Description: Restores HP to allies in a 750 unit radius. Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.

Regenerate Health.Description: Restores HP over time. If the user is attacked, the effect is lost.

Health Regeneration.Description: Restores a percentage of max health per second. This ability is disabled if damage is taken from an enemy Hero or Roshan within the last 4 seconds if your hero is melee or 6 seconds if your hero is ranged.

Disarm.Description: Disarms the target for 4.5 seconds. Lasts 3 on melee targets.

Lesser Maim.Description: Gives a chance on attack to slow for 4 seconds.

Dominate.Description: Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit.

Lifesteal.Description: Gives lifesteal on attacks. Helm of the Dominator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Pierce.Description: Grants a chance to deal bonus damage.

Spellblock.Description: Blocks most targeted spells once every 17 seconds.

Transfer Spellblock.Description: Transfers the Spellblock passive to an allied hero, which lasts 17 seconds, does not block spells for you and goes into cooldown as soon as the buff blocks a spell, if the 17 seconds pass and the buff has not been used up, Linken's Sphere does not trigger another cooldown.

Chain Lightning.Description: Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits 4 targets, dealing damage. Maelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.

Energy Charge.Description: Gains charges (max 10) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area(1200 radius). When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.
Gains charges (max 10) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area(1200 radius). When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.

Mirror Image (melee).Description: Creates 2 illusions of your hero that last 20 seconds. Melee illusions deal 33% damage and take 350% damage.

Mirror Image (ranged).Description: Creates 2 illusions of your hero that last 20 seconds. Ranged illusions deal 28% damage and take 400% damage.

Berserk.Description: Gives +100 attack speed and +30% movement speed but causes you to take extra 30% damage.

Lifesteal.Description: Grants lifesteal on attacks. Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Valor.Description: Reduces the armor of you and your target. Lasts 7 seconds.

Mekansm Aura.Description: Bonus HP Regen in an area. Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.

Restore.Description: Heals 250 HP and gives +2 armor in an area.

Static Charge.Description: Places a charged shield on a target unit.

Chain Lightning.Description: Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits 8 targets, dealing damage. Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.

Mini-Bash.Description: Gives a chance to minibash and deal bonus damage.

Lifesteal.Description: Grants lifesteal on attacks. Morbid of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Necronomicon.Extra Info: Has 3 levels, each upgrade costs another 1250 gold

Demonic Summoning.Description: Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you. Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level. Lasts 40 seconds.

Place Ward.Description: Places an Observer Ward to give sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 7 minutes.

Observer Ward.Extra Info: Destroying a ward grants a 50 gold bounty. You can now(patch 6.80) transfer a charge to an ally.

Poison Attack.Description: Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing, depending on whether your hero is melee or ranged. The damage cannot be fatal. Orb of Venom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Soul Burn.Description: Silences target unit for 5 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30%.

Phase.Description: Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. Phase is cancelled upon using another item or ability.

Barrier.Description: Gives nearby friendly units a shield that blocks 400 spell damage.

Damage Block.Description: Blocks physical attack damage, depending on the type of hero you are. Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a chance to block damage from creeps.

Switch Attribute.Description: Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.

Destroy Tree/Ward.Description: Destroy a target tree or ward.

Quell.Description: Gives bonus attack damage against non-hero units, depending on the type of hero you are.

Burn Damage.Description: Deals damage per second in a 700 radius.

Reset Cooldowns.Description: Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

Aquila Aura.Description: Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 radius.

Basilius Aura.Description: Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 radius.

Greater Maim.Description: Gives a chance on attack to slow for 5 seconds.

Lesser Maim.Description: Gives a chance on attack to slow for 4 seconds.

Lifesteal.Description: Grants lifesteal on attacks. Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

Hex.Description: Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Destroys illusions.

Place Ward.Description: Places a Sentry Ward to give True Sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 4 minutes.

Sentry Ward.Extra Info: Destroying a ward grants a 50 gold bounty. You can now(patch 6.80) transfer a charge to an ally.

Fade.Description: Fade to invisibility. If you move you will become visible.

Shadow Walk.Description: Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell. While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units. If attacking to break the invisibility, you gain 150 bonus damage on that attack. Lasts 12 seconds.

Shadow Blade.Extra Info: Activating this item does not break channeling abilities.

Arctic Blast.Description: Emits a freezing wave that does 200 damage to enemies and slows their movement by 40% for 4 seconds.

Freezing Aura.Description: Reduces attack speed on enemies. Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.

Bash.Description: Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.

Skull Basher.Extra Info: Skull Basher cannot be purchased by Slardar, Faceless Void, Troll Warlord, or Spirit Breaker.

Smoke of Deceit.Description: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisiblity and bonus movement speed for a brief time. Minimap icons will also be hidden. Upon moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, the invisibility and movement speed bonus is lost.

Sacrifice.Description: Consume 150 HP to temporarily gain 150 mana. Lasts 10 seconds.

Damage Block.Description: Gives a chance to block damage. Melee Heroes will block 20 damage, whilst Ranged Heroes only block 10.

Eat Tree.Description: Consume a tree to restore HP over time. Comes with 4 charges.

Teleport.Description: Teleports you to within 575 range of a target friendly building. While channeling, gives 200 range vision on the target and pings your allies' minimaps. Teleporting to a non-fountain building takes additional time if any allies have also teleported within a 1100 radius of your target within 25 seconds.

Break.Description: Breaks whenever you attack or are attacked. When broken the bonus hit point regeneration is lost as 25 movement speed. Restores when you haven't attacked or been attacked in the last 13 seconds.

Soul Release.Description: Heals HP over time for friendly units, but deals damage over time for enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected unit takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.

Urn of Shadows.Extra Info: Can cast on magic immune allies, but not enemies.

Damage Block.Description: Heals HP over time for friendly units, but deals damage over time for enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected unit takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.

Magic Weakness.Description: Emits a weakening blast that increases the magical damage enemies take. Lasts 25 seconds.
Grants a variety of bonuses to nearby allies. Lifesteal bonuses from Vladmir's Aura only affect melee units. Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
